item.title: Report E-2023090133
item.description:
Report E-2023090133

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-13T18:13:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-25
  • City: BLAINE
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: VEOLIA ES TECHNICAL SOLUTIONS, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Upon arrival at the dock at Veolia's 10 intransit facility in Blaine, MN, a Veolia employee noticed an acidic smell in the back of the truck. Upon further investigation, the employee located a container that had cracked down the side and leaked about 3 gallons of the material on to the trailer. The spill was cleaned up and the remaining waste was transferred into a new container.

item.title: Report X-2023080464
item.description:
Report X-2023080464

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-11T03:12:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-01
  • City: MINNEAPOLIS
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE DMP BY THE RESPONDER. IN THE DMP, PACKAGE WAS OPENED AND FOUND TO CONTAIN ONE, 1 GALLON, PLASTIC JUG OF NU-BRITE CONDENSER COIL CLEANER, BEING SHIPPED AS A CORROSIVE HAZ-MAT PACKAGE (UN3266, CORROSIVE LIQUID, BASIC, INORGANIC, N.O.S., (SODIUM HYDROXIDE), 8, II, 1 FIBERBOARD BOX X 1 GALLON). UPON INSPECTION RESPONDER DISCOVERED THE CAP ON THE GALLON JUG WAS LOOSE, WHICH ALLOWED A SMALL AMOUNT OF THE SODIUM HYDROXIDE SOLUTION TO LEAK ONTO THE OUTSIDE CARTON. ALL PRODUCT WAS PROCESSED THROUGH THE DMP.
